title: Impact of SEC Expansion
description:
Wendi Nix, Tom Luginbill, and Harry Lyles Jr, discuss the consequences Texas and Oklahoma leaving will have on the rest of the Big 12. The crew also react to Kirk Herbstreit's comments on the current state of college football.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The CFB Live crew discuss how Texas and Oklahoma heading to the SEC will affect the rest of the Big 12, state rivalries, and the College Football Playoff.
